definitions.text: a whole formed by a union of two or more elements or parts
(chemistry) a substance formed by chemical union of two or more elements or ingredients in definite proportion by weight
an enclosure of residences and other building (especially in the Orient)
make more intense, stronger, or more marked; ,
examples: Her rudeness intensified his dislike for her
Pot smokers claim it heightens their awareness
This event only deepened my convictions

definitions.text: combine so as to form a whole; mix
composed of more than one part; compound flower heads"
examples: compound leaves are composed of several lobes;

definitions.text: consisting of two or more substances or ingredients or elements or parts
examples: a blackberry is a compound fruit

definitions.text: composed of many distinct individuals united to form a whole or colony
